title: Rek 'Sai buff ideas
body:
hi there community,

i would like to post some ideas about Rek'Sai..so here we are:

1) Ability Dmg to the tunnel breaker  e.g 50/100/150 AP Dmg +5% of enemy's total HP

2) Attack Dmg to all the units Rek'Sai passes through when she uses Void Rush  e.g 50/100/150 AD Dmg + 30% AD 

3) Tunnels need 3 sec to be destroyed 

4) Tunnels give a small radius vision

5) Q Prey Seeker applies slow (Rek'Sai has 0 cc abilities)

All in all i think that the tunnel idea is pretty awesome but they are very vulnerable and there is no trade dmg for the breaker to make a decision to destroy it and its a procedure that is pretty much easy as just standing on it! no brainer!....especially when the enemy team is ahead and your team defends the base Void Rush is pretty useless because most of the times there are no tunnels available and you wont have the opportunity to make new ones cause of defense...
Also giving Void Rush a small Dmg (which i find it very reasonable) makes Rek'Sai a more random threat

your thoughts?

p.s i don say that all of the 5 ideas should be applied! that would be super op!

replies.body: i would say more like a small rework in her abilities mechanics...she is a very unique champion and i think she needs some unique treatment...
lol reksai will be getting nerfed, that champion is seriously r**et**arded, moving all fast and dropping its semon in my base everywhere.
moving fast but many times with no reason...total lack of cc is bad for ganking too
You do realise she has a knock up, a form of CC that is unable to be cleansed or otherwise mitigated?

Giving vision with her tunnels is a really bad idea. She has so many of them, and it would cause Rek'sai's team to have a stupid advantage. I don't care if its not much, but you can put it right under dragon, for example. It also just let's you have vision of every bush ever.
ok maybe the vision is too much...but i think tunnels should dmg the breaker for him to make a decision  to break it or leave it (if he needs the health...) the dmg on ulti is debatable too..
